name: Unstachanica
description:
(Playable in browser)

 You have to repair broken spaceships but some building materials seem unstable...

The game doesn't have a tutorial (Yet!) so here are the controls and some tips:

- You have 4 screens: Shop, Table, Workshop and Garage, the bottom buttons switch between them

- You can select a spaceship to repair at the Garage, it will show which parts you'll have to build and assemble

- At the bottom of the screen you have the MANUAL which tells you EVERYTHING you need to know about spaceships, components, pieces, machines and materials

- To build something buy the required ingredients in the shop, transform and craft them into useful parts using machines and assemble them to make more complex components

- Some materials are UNSTABLE which means that when its bar gets empty they evaporate, so use them quickly!
